metadata.title: dstudio - Designing everyday records
metadata.description: dstudio is an app development studio that makes the experience of recording daily life warmer and more meaningful. We create the life-logging app to dot.

hero.headline:
Capture every moment
as a record
hero.subcopy:
Small pieces of daily life come together to tell your own story.
dstudio creates the joy of recording.

philosophy.intro:
dstudio is an app development studio that makes
the experience of recording daily life warmer and more meaningful.
philosophy.body:
We pursue comfort that makes you want to open the app every day,
rather than flashy features.
We believe that when each person's day becomes a small dot,
they form a beautiful picture together.
philosophy.quote:
It's okay not to be perfect.
Recording is about
capturing today as it is.

values.description: Recording you can start without pressure
Filling each day together, not alone

contact.heading: Let's talk
contact.description:
Suggestions, feedback, or just a hello.
Feel free to reach out.
